title: In 'Blackouts,' one writer brings America's hidden queer history to the forefront
description: In Blackouts, Justin Torres plays with fact and fiction, and calls into question whose story gets told.

title: LeVar Burton to replace Drew Barrymore as host of National Book Awards
description: Barrymore was originally set to host American literature's glitziest night, until she announced her talk show would be returning during the Writers Guild strike.

title: Scalise drops out of race for speaker of the House, leaving Congress in limbo
description: Scalise became the Republican nominee in a secret ballot election, but failed to secure enough votes to succeed on the House floor.
